#! /usr/bin/env python
# -*- encoding: utf-8 -*-

# http://www.codechef.com/problems/CLNFORUM

# 8 = ate, w8 = wait,  gr8 = great, 4 = for, b4 = before
# reads from stdin
# first line = number of test cases
# following lines: test cases
# preserve all spaces!!!

word_replacements = { "8": "ate", "w8": "wait", "gr8": "great", "4": "for", "b4": "before" }


number_of_cases = int(raw_input())

for donothingday in range(number_of_cases):
    line = raw_input()
    line += " "     # qad hack so last word gets added as well, is removed when printed out
    current_word = ""
    newline = ""
    
    for i in line:
        if i != " ":
            current_word += i
            continue
        if current_word != "":
            if word_replacements.has_key(current_word):
                newline += word_replacements[current_word]
            else:
                newline += current_word
            current_word = ""
        newline += i
    print newline[:-1] # chop of last space
